content.html: .@AskPayPal You're enabling an attack where someone can steal money intended for you by them signing up for a PayPal account using your email address then setting up 2FA. The email account owner can never recover the PayPal account and its funds. You need to fix this.
content.value: .@AskPayPal You're enabling an attack where someone can steal money intended for you by them signing up for a PayPal account using your email address then setting up 2FA. The email account owner can never recover the PayPal account and its funds. You need to fix this.
